experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: What I have done so far

list.title: Lead Frontend Engineer
points: Led frontend architecture and development using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
Built scalable and accessible UI components with Radix UI and Shadcn/ui.
Integrated backend services using Node.js, Prisma, GraphQL, and Stripe.
Managed deployments with Docker, Vercel, and AWS (basic).
Implemented analytics and monitoring via Google Analytics and Sentry.
Enabled internationalization (i18n) to support multiple languages and regions.
Collaborated with designers and backend developers to deliver full product experiences.

list.title: Frontend Developer (Freelancer )
points: Delivered production-ready websites and apps using React.js and Next.js.
Focused on performance optimization, accessibility, and responsive design.
Applied state management via Redux and React Hook Form.
Collaborated closely with clients and designers to translate specs into working products.

list.title: Frontend Developer (React js)
points: Created efficient and effective software solutions to meet client requirements and enhance user experience.
Built and maintained user interfaces using React.js (MUI), ensuring a seamless and intuitive user experience.
Improved website performance and speed by optimizing code and implementing best practices.
Worked closely with designers, back-end developers, and project managers.

list.title: Junior Web Developer (Freelancer)
points: Built responsive web applications for small clients using React.js and CSS frameworks.
Gained experience in real-world development cycles and remote team collaboration.
